relatedBlades.title: A cloud-first reality for the public sector
relatedBlades.subtitle: Protect. Connect. Modernise.
relatedBlades.copy: Greater resilience, improved service availability, and enhanced security will help the public sector reap the rewards of emerging technologies.

statsFeatures.description: Of global web traffic crosses Cloudflare's network, giving us a superior level of threat intelligence that our customers benefit from.

statsFeatures.title: 247 B
statsFeatures.description: That's how many attacks we're able to protect against every day, demonstrating a proven track record in securing the world's most critical infrastructure.
Of Cloudflare traffic is already post-quantum secure – demonstrating our commitment to future-proofing security in anticipation of emerging cryptographic threats.

relatedBlades.mainHeadline: National security: Zero Trust in a changing world

content.value: Moving away from on-premises infrastructure to cloud-based services is a major focus for the UK public sector. It's changing the way people and systems interact. From hot desks to job-shares, from remote working to being available 24/7, the edge of your department extends far beyond the buildings people work in.

National security must be always-on, no matter where. Because threats don't only work office hours, and traditional perimeter-centred thinking is simply no longer enough. Welcome to the age of Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA).

entry_button.elementName: Cloudflare for Public Sector - Solutions Page - UK - National security: Zero Trust in a changing world - Left - Button

content.value: Eliminate lateral movement
Shrink your attack surface by enforcing context-based, least-privilege access policies for every resource.
Improve team productivity
Make on-premises applications as easy to use as SaaS apps and
reduce remote access support tickets
Simplify management
Simplify the setup and operation of ZTNA with robust software connectors and unified Zero Trust policies.
Scale Zero Trust effortlessly
Shield critical applications and high-risk user groups first – then expand cloud-native ZTNA to protect your entire business

relatedBlades.title: See why public sector organisations are choosing Cloudflare

columnContent.title: Provide a superior online experience
columnContent.description: Citizens, students, and other public sector end users want online experiences they can trust. Cloudflare's comprehensive security services defend against a wide range of web application vulnerabilities.

columnContent.title: Mitigate DDoS attacks
columnContent.description: Public sector websites and networks can be attacked for a variety of reasons. Cloudflare's network can handle the largest-ever recorded cyberattack several times over and mitigates close to the attack source for faster response times.

columnContent.title: Improve agility and lower operational costs
columnContent.description: Replacing legacy infrastructure with cloud-based services accelerates time to market and frees budget to be used for innovation. Cloudflare One makes managing multiple security and networking services easy.

columnContent.title: Secure remote workforces
columnContent.description: Provide secure access to internal applications for any user – regardless of device or location – with seamless authentication at the network edge.

columnContent.title: Protect employees' internet browsing
columnContent.description: Keep users and data safe from threats on the internet. Backhauling user traffic through centralised firewalls is slow. Cloudflare provides a secure web gateway that brings comprehensive security anywhere your users are.

columnContent.title: Protect network infrastructure
columnContent.description: Safeguard on-premises infrastructure and hybrid cloud deployments from attack, providing consistent uptime and fast performance.

relatedBlades.bladeName: Cloudflare for Public Sector - Solutions Page - UK - How can we help
relatedBlades.title: How Cloudflare can help

content.value: Cloudflare Magic WAN – Replaces legacy network equipment with a secure, cloud-native network.
Cloudflare Zero Trust – Provides Zero Trust Access to on-premises, cloud, and related services.
Cloudflare API Gateway – Secures multi-cloud APIs and enables seamless data flow.

accordionElements.title: AI and automation with Cloudflare Workers

content.value: Serverless edge computing platform.
Departments and agencies can deploy applications, automate workflows, and integrate AI without managing infrastructure.
Enables low-latency, highly scalable automation and AI-driven processing directly at Cloudflare's global network edge, with no egress fees.

accordionElements.title: Cybersecurity and Zero Trust Network Access

content.value: Ensuring least-privilege access and secure remote work.
Web Application Firewall (WAF) and DDoS protection defend against cyber threats targeting legacy systems.
Secure Web Gateway and Cloud Access Security Broker enhance visibility and control over cloud applications, supporting compliance with NCSC Cyber Assessment Framework (CAF) guidelines.
Replace legacy networks with cloud-native connectivity.
Eliminating on-premises hardware with cloud-based security and performance.
Securely connect on-premises and cloud applications without legacy firewalls or VPNs.
API Gateway and Security – Protects data-sharing APIs from abuse.
End-to-end encryption – Ensures secure interdepartmental data transmission.
Zero Trust Access – Controls who can access sensitive government data.
Bot management to prevent fraudulent identity registrations.
Zero Trust Access.
API Security.

columnContent.heading: Protecting web services, APIs, and endpoints from a wide range of cybersecurity threats, including DDoS
columnContent.copy:
This UK public sector client needed a comprehensive security solution to protect its web services from a wide range of potential threats, including web scraping, automated bot attacks, DDoS, and application-layer threats.

![API specific attack protection - Image](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/4gR9F1IEYpUW8KXFkSwg0A/471f6e482a23ebe93139700ddb01d05b/API-specific_attack_protection.jpg)

contentList.title: Cloudflare provided the client with a cloud-native security solution that:
Protects their web services and endpoints from Layer 7 cybersecurity threats.
Increases the performance of their web-facing applications.
Drives efficiencies through the consolidation and removal of legacy infrastructure.

relatedBlades.title: Safeguarding critical national infrastructure
relatedBlades.copy:
When you're dealing with the public at times of crisis and trauma, everyone and everything needs to be performing at its best. This UK public service organisation needed to protect itself and its users from high volumes of malicious bot traffic, while maintaining availability and performance.

Alongside one of our strategic partners, Cloudflare has provided the following:

columnContent.title: Access
columnContent.description: Enables remote users to securely connect to internal resources.

columnContent.title: Bot management
columnContent.description: Uses global threat intelligence and machine learning to block malicious bot traffic.

columnContent.title: Tunnel
columnContent.description: A secure tunnelling solution that establishes a private connection between internal applications and the Cloudflare edge.

relatedBlades.title: Ready to connect, protect, and accelerate your organisation?
